text: Munofiqon ʙa Alloh savgand mexūrand, ki naguftaand cizero, ki Pajomʙar va musalmonon az on norohat şavand, vale kalimai kufrro ʙar zaʙon rondaand. Va pas az on ki islom ovarda ʙudand, kofir şudaand. Va ʙar qasd kor kardand, ki ʙa Pajomʙar Muhammad sallallohu alajhi va sallam zararho ovarand, ammo ʙa on noil naşudand. Va munofiqon cizero inkor nakardand, magar Allohu pajomʙaraşro, ki az ƣanimatho sarvatmandaşon kardand. Pas, agar tavʙa kunand, nekiaşon dar on ast va agar rūj gardonand, Alloh ʙa azoʙi dardnoke dar dunjovu oxirat azoʙaşon xohad kard va onhoro dar rūi zamin na dūstdore xohad ʙud, ki azoʙi Allohro az onho ʙozdorad va na madadkore, ki az azoʙi Alloh naçotaşon dihad
